root.name: My Secret Diary
root.description: IntroductionMy secret diary being a part of the "My Games" franchise published by Oxygen Games is a game that allows young girls to record their daily activities and plan their schedule on the Nintendo DS.FeaturesThe game allows the player to lock the diary with a secret password. Also can the player consult personality quizzes and compatibility quizzes. My secret Diary has a 4 player multilayer mode and a calendar on which the player can add dates and comments.MingamesMy secret diary also has 3 minigamesFortune Cookie Choose one of the four proposed fortune cookies to read your fortune.Crystal Ball Ask the crystal ball a yes/no question and by rubbing it with the stylus it will give the player an answer.Aura Jewel Shows the colour of the players current aura (?).
